message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-1-2, translated into en
data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.1 Improve, in particular through international assistance to developing countries, the mobilization of domestic resources with a view to strengthening national capacities for the collection of taxes and other revenues17.1.2 Proportion of the national budget financed by national taxes5/1/2020 12:00:00 AMMFBCDEIRAMBONA EricStatistical serviceSDG focal point within the Ministry79311134eric.irambona85@gmail.comThis is the percentage of the general state budget financed by own resources%Administrative data of OBR revenue and ISTEEBU national accounts, 2017Administrative dataannualannualOBR / ISTEEBUThe OBR is responsible for compiling this indicator at the national levelThe OBR is the body recognized by the Burundian government for the collection, processing and dissemination of official statistics assisting in planning and decision-making.This indicator is relevant because it highlights the proportion of people victims of violence during a year.Ratio between own resources and the general state budget, expressed as a percentageAnnualAvailable nationallyThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international level2016
